UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Origin and functional diversification of an amphibian defense peptide arsenal.
Literature.Author: Roelants K, Fry BG, Ye L, Stijlemans B, Brys L, Kok P, Clynen E, Schoofs L, Cornelis P, Bossuyt F

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=64 µM,Mouse splenocytes:IC50=2 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2-4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=4-8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=0.5µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=16µM),Trypanosoma brucei(90-100% Killing=2-4µM)
